description: Canonical example cards demonstrating gitban best practices across all card types and complexity levels
_note: Example files use descriptive names (feature-simple-button.md) for readability. To use as actual gitban cards, rename to gitban convention (backlog-P1-feature-title-id.md) or use download_example_card() which handles this automatically.
